channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Oracle to Invest $6.5 Billion in AI and Cloud Infrastructure in Malaysia
item.description: Oracle Corp. plans to invest more than $6.5 billion to establish a public cloud region in Malaysia, aiming to meet the country’s growing demand for ar...

item.title: Trump campaign ad falsely claims Harris will raise taxes on families
item.description: New ad clips, snips and twists so many things that nearly every frame is deceptive.

item.title: AI to Have Human-Level Abilities in a Few Years, SoftBank CEO Says
item.description: Masayoshi Son reiterated his bullish forecasts for artificial intelligence in a speech that stressed advances made by OpenAI.

item.title: Biden touts economic gains, acknowledges a long way to go
item.description: Interest rate cut "is not a declaration of victory, it’s a declaration of progress."

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Find insight on BCE, STV Group, box-office results in China, and more in the latest Market Talks covering the Tech, Media & Telecom sector.

item.title: The real reasons people leave Donald Trump’s rallies early
item.description: Trump consistently draws large, enthusiastic crowds to his events, and at nearly all of them, another trend is clear: Scores of people head out before...

item.title: Janet Yellen Defends Her Record – and Delivers a Warning
item.description: The Treasury secretary is defending her legacy — and warning that the stability of the U.S. economy is at stake.

item.title: Liz Cheney rallies with Harris, implores nation to reject ‘depraved cruelty’ of Trump
item.description: Harris and Cheney appeared in Ripon, Wis., a small city in northeastern Wisconsin that is known as the birthplace of the Republican Party.

item.title: Harris dismisses Trump as ‘not serious’ on the economy in MSNBC interview
item.description: It was her first solo interview with a national network as the Democratic presidential nominee.

item.title: OpenAI Nearly Doubles Valuation to $157 Billion in Funding Round
item.description: The startup behind ChatGPT raised $6.6 billion from backers including Microsoft, SoftBank and Thrive Capital.

item.title: Seniors Worried About Rising Costs of Illegal Immigration Told to Suck It Up by Their Mayor
item.description: In what has to be one of this year’s most outrageous examples of disregard for American citizens in favor of illegal aliens, one callous Maine politic...

item.title: Report Says Illegal Aliens Responsible for Up to 75% of Violent Crime Arrests in Midtown Manhattan
item.description: New York City is in the midst of a violent migrant crime wave. According to a recent report by the New York Post, illegal aliens account for up to 75 ...

item.title: Air marshals want out of TSA and into a new law enforcement agency
item.description: The Air Marshal Association says TSA lacks law enforcement culture and the marshals want to do more police work in airports.

item.title: Obama to campaign for Harris in month leading up to election
item.description: The former president’s increased activity begins Thursday with an event in Pittsburgh.

item.title: California Illegal Aliens May Get to Push #1 for a Phone Subsidy
item.description: For years mass immigration advocates have rejected any meaningful distinction in status between illegal aliens and legal immigrants. As such, many sta...

item.title: DHS Inspector General Releases Report on CBP One App, Highlights Mismanagement
item.description: On August 19, the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) Office of the Inspector General (OIG) released a report critiquing the CBP One mobile app. To ...

item.title: Fed moves to protect weakening job market with bold rate cut
item.description: The move signals that the central bank is growing nervous about the declining labor market.

item.title: This Teenage Hacker Became a Legend Attacking Companies. Then His Rivals Attacked Him.
item.description: His life in cybercrime began at age 11, investigators say, and went on to incursions into Nvidia and “Grand Theft Auto.” His case has brought worries ...

item.title: Joe Biden preps to sell the economy — to boost his legacy and help Harris
item.description: Biden is determined to convince a skeptical public that he strengthened the economy.

item.title: No Matter Who Writes the Check, U.S. Taxpayers Bear the Burden of Illegal Immigration
